data.actual_result: The X/Close button is static in the top right corner
data.expected_result: The X/Close button for Overlay should move to the left side
data.short_description: Overlay X/Close Button is static/doesn't move in the top right hand corner of your screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch a game and have Discord overlay enabled - Join a voice channel - Move the box that contains voice channel users to the top right corner
